---
name: setup-angular-test
description: Implement .spec files to test Angular v20+ applications with TestBed, ComponentFixture, and Jasmine/Karma. Use for unit testing components, services, directives, and pipes. Triggers on creating .spec files, configuring TestBed, writing test cases with Jasmine syntax, or running tests with Karma.
